    The Manufacturing AI Research Center was newly established on January 1, 2024, as a direct organization under the Vice President of the Korea Institute of Industrial Technology. It aims to concentrate capabilities on developing an AI platform for the "AI-based innovation in manufacturing" initiative, promoting the rapid dissemination of the developed platform, and fostering in-house AI experts.

    Contact Info

    +82 (032) 456 78 90

    Informative Data Design

    Innovative Data Storytelling

    Bridging Science and Design

    Creating intuitive representations of complex research.

    Focused on making scientific data understandable, this project bridges the gap between raw information and meaningful interpretation.

    Visual Data Communication

    Empowering understanding through design.

    Explore how thoughtful data visualization can illuminate patterns, trends, and critical insights in scientific research.

    2025, Keynote Speech

    The Manufacturing AI Research Center was newly established on January 1, 2024, as a direct organization under the Vice President of the Korea Institute of Industrial Technology. It aims to concentrate capabilities on developing an AI platform for the "AI-based innovation in manufacturing" initiative, promoting the rapid dissemination of the developed platform, and fostering in-house AI experts.
